amendment.description: To increase funding for rural decentralized water systems.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1175 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1175 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Booker to Amendment SA 1092. (consideration: CR S5160-5163) To increase funding for rural decentralized water systems.
